stimulusHtml: If the interest rate on loans before adjusting for inflation is 9%, and the expected inflation rate is 4%, then which of the following must be true?
choicesHtml: Lenders are expected to receive an additional 4% on their loaned funds.
Borrowers are expected to pay an additional 4% on their borrowed funds.
The expected real interest rate is 9%.
The expected real interest rate is 13%.
